description:
In environments such as northern Canada, mosquitoes and flies seem undeterred by insect repellents. And not everyone can tolerate chemicals, especially around the face. This jacket is an excellent alternative.

  • Made of airy, bug-proof mesh. Small enough to prevent no-see-ums from getting in
  • Adult sizing. Small fits up to 73kg (160lb.). Medium fits up to 91kg (200lb.). Large fits up to 109kg (240lb.). X-Large fits up to 136kg (300lb.)
name: Coghlan's Bug Jacket - Unisex
